definition: the daily life of a family

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
simple home-style meal/common occurrence/nothing out of the ordinary
to talk or chat about ordinary daily life
to engage in small talk/to chit chat

sentences.english: Over-night fame has become a common phenomenon in our modern society.
sentences.chinese: 一夜成名成了現代社會的家常便飯。

sentences.english: Peter, you should have told them it’s only a little supper.
sentences.chinese: 彼得，你應該告訴他們這只是一頓家常便飯。

sentences.english: Wang and India in the patient at home, Wen Jiabao warmly pulling home.
sentences.chinese: 在患者王福印家，溫家寶親切地拉起家常。

sentences.english: But it used to be the most popular staple food for people in Northern Shaanxi.
sentences.chinese: 但是這個本土食物在過去是陝北人最家常的主食。

sentences.english: Old women all like sitting in the tree shadows and gossiping on summer days.
sentences.chinese: 老奶奶們到了夏天都愛坐在樹陰涼兒里拉家常。

sentences.english: And he really wants like a home-cooked meal.
sentences.chinese: 而他很想喫一頓家常菜。

sentences.english: France is the most expensive dish Egan, the dishes are fried steak plus potatoes wire.
sentences.chinese: 法國最名貴的菜是鵝肝，家常菜是炸牛排外加土豆絲。

sentences.english: Hear Devan and Mason talk about their love of home cooking.
sentences.chinese: 聽聽徳凡和梅森如何談論他們最愛的家常菜。

sentences.english: Do you all want to order some homestyle tofu?
sentences.chinese: 你們想不想點一份家常豆腐？

sentences.english: Spruce up your homemade lunch with some tasty extras, like condiments.
sentences.chinese: 再加些可口的調味品，讓你的家常午餐更漂亮。

sentences.english: Don't waste time on domestic trivialities.
sentences.chinese: 不要在家常瑣事上浪費時間。

sentences.english: The girl is used to home cooking.
sentences.chinese: 那個女孩習慣了家常飯。

sentences.english: We have the old system during rewrite, so chaos is constant.
sentences.chinese: 我們重寫舊的系統，因此混亂是家常便飯。

sentences.english: Chinese home cooking must be more delicious.
sentences.chinese: 中國的家常菜一定更可口。

sentences.english: Nowadays you have a game Saturday, Tuesday, Saturday, Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 現在一週雙賽是家常便飯。

sentences.english: The restaurant serves plain home-made meals.
sentences.chinese: 那個餐館供應簡單的家常菜。

definition: to talk or chat about ordinary daily life
appetizer/small side dish/easy job/piece of cake/see also 小菜一碟[xiao3 cai4 yi1 die2]
variant of 閒談|闲谈[xian2 tan2]
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor
dish/lean and hungry look (resulting from vegetarian diet)/emaciated look (from malnutrition)

pinyin: dong1 jia1 chang2 xi1 jia1 duan3
